mapper.select: select b_no, b_title, b_date, b_lovecnt, b_replycnt, c.c_dist, b.c_no from board b, category c where b.c_no=c.c_no and b_no in (select b_no from (select rownum, b_no from(select b_no from board where to_char(b_date)=to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') order by b_lovecnt-b_hatecnt desc) where rownum<=5))

select b_no, b_title, b_date, b_lovecnt, b_replycnt, c.c_dist, b.c_no from board b, category c where b.c_no=c.c_no and b_no in (select b_no from (select rownum, b_no from(select *from board where to_char(b_date)>=to_char(sysdate-7,'YY/MM/DD') order by b_lovecnt-b_hatecnt desc) where rownum<=5))

select b_no, b_title, b_date, b_lovecnt, b_replycnt, c.c_dist, b.c_no from board b, category c where b.c_no=c.c_no and b_no in (select b_no from (select rownum, b_no from(select *from board where to_char(b_date)>=to_char(sysdate-30,'YY/MM/DD') order by b_lovecnt-b_hatecnt desc) where rownum<=5))
select *from category where c_no>=#{startNum} and c_no<=#{endNum}
